name: Low Magic Age
description: Adventure and fight in a medieval fantasy open world! Build heroic characters with various abilities, travel through villages, cities, or perilous dungeons. Strategic turn-based combat system and advanced character building - Fog of war, charging and flanking, and more in the fast-paced Arena mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3/7/8/10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
